titleStmt.title: An act for laying an imposition upon coals towards the building and maintaining ships for guarding the seas. Die Veneris, 28 Martii, 1651. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: An act for laying an imposition upon coals towards the building and maintaining ships for guarding the seas. Die Veneris, 28 Martii, 1651. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: 10K-10L2. Also issued as part of a through-paged set with a table for the entire set added.
On 10K2r: last word of first line of text: "Eng-"; first word of line below initial: "that"; last word of last full line: "Be".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
